reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We picked this hotel because of the price, and closeness to the Interstate. There was no problem with check-in, but we had some trouble locating our room as the configuration of the hotel is somewhat odd.
reviews.title: Average Days Inn with cooked to order breakfast

reviews.text: We got a very small room with one queen size bed. Since we were traveling with our bikes, it was very difficult to store them in the room. The bathroom was very small as well, but it was clean.
reviews.title: Not worth it

reviews.text: They have a pool, and a fitness room with a couple of old stair masters (they didn't look safe to use).
reviews.title: Fine Days hotel
